text: Really a great place to eat, the pizza was good, light flaky and the garlic knots were on point. Has a really eclectic atmosphere with outdoor seating and friendly staff.  A god place to eat and not expensive. ü§ôüëçüòé

name: Bee
text: I think they put crack in the cheese, because I'm addicted. I stopped by for dinner with my man and the kid after a trip across the street at the mall. Great fire roasted taste & fresh ingredients. Cool atmosphere to chill with a beer.

name: Steve Wood
text: Order a large loaded, through Door Dash . I was shocked. It was a little shaken up on the ride, but I didn't care. The pizza was awesome. The crust was kinda dark and burny, in a good way. Toppings were fresh and plentiful. Of course I ‚Ä¶More

text: The place is clean, we chose to sit outside a beautiful day, are Pizza was perfect. The employees are VERY nice people.

name: Chucc Diezel
text: Best fired pizza I've ever had. If you like the "make your own pizza" chain where you are from, trust me...this is BETTER. Best pizza chain in the US

name: Angela Moffett
text: Delicious pizza prepared with fresh toppings you get to choose. Fire roasted and served with a large beverage selection.  Will def return again.

name: James Hamilton
text: Simply put the $20.32 price tag for a byo large that is like the size papajohns use to do back in the day but even yet more expensive is not worth it. Also getting told that, "oh ask for more toppings next time" is just a we really don't ‚Ä¶More

name: Michele Simmons
text: Fairly long wait on a Friday night.  The Keto Crust pizza was good.  There was a little confusion at the serving station and one of our three pizzas sat there without being served for quite a while.

name: Chris Hoey
text: My family's first visit to Blaze. We dug it, from the whole customize your pizza thing to how quickly it came out. Tasted good, staff was nice, we will likely be visiting again

name: Kavya Sriram
text: Overall, very delicious. The industrial feel and fiery colors are a great feature, and their pizzas are delicious. There were a lot of people, so expect it to take 20 minutes. But they are awesome!

name: Kevin Gath
text: Unlimited toppings at a great price. The specialty drinks are delicious and they use strapless lids. Bug fan of this place

name: Erik Carlson
text: Got two gluten free pizzas. Mine was done on time. The other pizza took an additional 10 minutes, was very overcooked and the bacon got burnt on it. Meanwhile, the pizza I ordered lost all of it's heat. So 1 cold pizza. 1 burnt pizza. ü§î

name: Karen Tracy
text: Good thin crust pizza made to order and quick fire baked. Delicious. High energy music.

name: Jason Bullock
text: The food is okay so long as the wait is short. The hardest part is watching some young Male manager go around being disrespectful to the employees and then being  incredibly fake kind to the customer as if we hadn't all seen you over the ‚Ä¶More

text: The pizza was excellent. The personal not so much. I don't think they are use to African-Americans or just did not like me. I was in 9-16-2020 around 3 pm.

name: john pfluger
text: Excellent.  I considered the build your own a dare.. how much can I fit on the pizza, AND in my stomach?

text: The pizza was delicious! Tons of options, and for only $8.50 you can add as many toppings as you'd like.

name: Cherie Miller
text: I love that I can get an awesome gluten free pizza just the way I want. Definitely recommend! And get the app, it makes it so much easier.

name: Bobby Jones
text: Good hot fresh pizza. Friendly service start to finish need I say more!

text: Great pizza made your way. Service was fast and the restaurant was exceptionally clean.

name: Chris Pinover
text: It's ok.  Price is good.  Topping selection is good.  In my opinion the pizza probably should have been cooked slightly longer.  Also with the garage door to the deck open on a chilly day there is no where from someone to sit inside and feel warm.

name: Maria De Fatima Alejo
text: Pizza is decent, nothing remarkable but good.  The way they prepare orders and get them out needs work though. The annoyance of it all makes me wish I just went somewhere else entirely. ‚Ä¶More

name: Joey Kindley
text: This place is GREAT!!! The service is friendly and very organized as well as pretty quick considering you are getting a pizza. The prices are awesome and the menu is just to die for. It is a wonderful wonderful experience EVERY time I go there. Oh yeah it's very clean!!!!! Love it love it love it!!!!!!

text: Great pizza, fast and the staff was extremely friendly!

name: Tonie Samuels
text: Very tasty! A personal pizza runs 8.50 which is awesome considering the limitless customization options. It's like Subway or Chipotle but with pizza. I got the Take Two, which is a half pizza and side salad for 8.50. Very good, will be going back for more!

name: Stephen Bass
text: Half good, half very bad. We split a pizza half was the meat pizza. I added a few extra things to my half. That was the good side. My wife got the artist pizza. That's where things went South. The amount of garlic they put on this half made ‚Ä¶More

name: Rosie Jaimes
text: We ordered our pizza on the app to make it faster & we arrived and the employee was so slow! One girl only focusing on online order today Sunday 12/1/19  & she was SO slow. They either need to train her more or get more people to help the online orders, that's the whole point of ordering online so it's faster.

name: Oogway woods
text: This was one of my favorite places to eat. Until today, After paying using my debet card. They charged me $2.13 for a tip. After I pushed the no tip button. Why in the Hell do you tip?? No one is a server. I'll had to get my own drink ‚Ä¶More

name: Aaron Dunn
text: This is neat, fast food pizza but better. They make it to order with you picking the items as you move down the line. They cook it in a brick oven in about 5 mins.

name: Arley Smith
text: Fantastic pizza! Clean bright restaurant, we had lunch and will for sure be back. I inhaled my pizza otherwise I'd show pics. They also had drinks other than the norm which were awesome. They had cookies but we didn't try them.

name: Belinda Morsut
text: I had a Keto crust for the first time which was delicious.  I didn't care for the white cream sauce, it was bland. Other than that the pizza was delicious. Service was good too especially for a busy Sunday afternoon.

name: Crepto Firebrick Creeper
text: As other's have mentioned, it is basically the same setup as the chain and local burrito shop's, but in this case the pizza version of that. I like that you can customize the build your own pizza precisely to how you want it, do keep in ‚Ä¶More

name: Amber wilmouth
text: Fast. Easy. Great food. I made an online order and by the time we got there they were finishing it up. It was our first time and it was great! We got pizza, garlic knots and dessert. Everything was good. The smores cookie thing was great!

name: M W
text: This place is awesome, interestingly make your own build your pizza, plenty of toppings, no artificial flavors or colors, great crew and timely manner for orders ‚Ä¶More

name: Nathaniel Nieuwendam
text: Great friendly people and create your own pizza!

name: Michael Largent
text: Pretty good. Priced well and they have a few interesting options. A half pizza makes a pretty good solo lunch that isn't too heavy.

name: Bernardo Gil
text: Best pizza ever. Period.

name: Pat Jr
text: Blaze has never let me downüí™üí™

name: Austin Downing
text: Cheap pizzas for like 9 bucks, you can put unlimited toppings, and it's delicious!

name: Cory Jackson
text: Not one for bad reviews but their staff and customer service are miserable. Was ignored by all 4 staff behind the counter and waited close to an hour for a simple order.

name: paul alcohol
text: I truly loved this place. The pizzas are made in front of you, are affordable, and taste amazing. They even have options for those with gluten allergies AND vegan options (though I'm not vegan, my fiance is). The service was friendly, fast, and enjoyable. Reccomend tenfold.

name: Dana Mathis
text: The staff was very helpful and friendly. Loved the food. Can't wait to go back.

name: Donnie Waid
text: Oh my gosh I've come to love this place, the pizza is just the right size for a single serving. And if you only eat half of it you can take it home. They custom make the pizza to how you want. And they do it right in front of you. The line ‚Ä¶More

name: Vitor S√°
text: Good pizza, nothing special. I wish it was a wood fire pizza but it's just a brick oven with gas fire.

name: Scott Stevens
text: The pizza is tasty, and the garlic knots are pretty fantastic, but the speed of this location leaves something to be desired.  We waited in line for a very long time considering it wasn't even all that busy.  Friendly people, though, just don't expect it to be "blazin'" fast.

name: Ian Schaffer
text: Good food good people working here and nice place to sit down and eat

name: Bryan Warren
text: Great Pizza , with a non dairy cheese option that is really good! And very fast for pizza!

name: Mike Honeycutt
text: Since I picked all the ingredients, my pizza was very good.  The pizzas are medium sized and took about 12 minutes to arrive on a very busy night for them.  I felt my Chicken BBQ pizza was a little light on the chicken, but we'll being going back.

name: Anthony Carlucci
text: Very good build your own open flame pizza.A nice char and plenty of tasty toppings.

name: Joe White
text: Quick,tasty, reasonably priced and DELICIOUS.  I would recommend this pizza place to ANYONE ANYTIME! I Love to go here and get a MAGNIFICENT lunch.

name: Molly H.
text: Fantastic location for Blaze. Right across the road from the mall, they offer a nice food option for along the shopping hotspot of Tunnel Rd. Plenty of seating inside and outside, they even has a beanbag toss game outside. ‚Ä¶More

name: Josh Folse
text: So good. And I love the fast food pizza idea while not sacrificing taste or quality! Will definitely be back.

name: Monique McIntosh
text: It was my first visit and I enjoyed my lunch. They had several options. I had pizza and a salad that I built. It was plenty of food and wasn't any more money than going to a sub shop.

name: Sierrah Guy
text: Best pizza and great service! They have any topping you can think of to choose from and they also have delicious salads. This is definitely the place to come when you are craving a yummy fresh pizza!

name: Crystal Moore
text: Our favorite pizza place

name: B. Luther
text: Tasty freshly made specialty pizzas right before your eyes.

name: Karen D
text: I enjoy having pizza made my way. You can also get half a pizza with a salad. Several salads to choose from. Always friendly faces.

name: Jim S
text: Some of the best pizza ever. Everything is top quality here!

name: Chris H.
text: We had the cauliflower crust and the toppings were a bit undercooked. As if they pulled it out of the oven based on time and did not bother to look at it. Salad was lackluster, nothing special. We may try it again and get regular crust. Will report back.

name: Terry Short
text: Great pizza, friendly staff and nice location. We ate at a Blaze pizza in the Raleigh area and loved it, and we're so excited about getting one in Ashville.  Now, let's get one in the enka candler area. We will be back soon.

text: Very good pizza

Service is slow.. go to Hendersonville road. Same food, faster.

name: Sierra who?
text: You get six slices in a personal pie. I thought it was more than enough for one sitting. The food was great if you know how to jazz up sime pizza. Bang for my buck, especially for the Asheville area.

I would say don't get so stoned that you can't even make a pepperoni pizza but then there probably wouldn't be anyone left working there. Seriously, a place to avoid.

Could not finish keto pizza.  Mod Pizza is better.  Really disappointed because I was looking forward to trying the keto crust.
